categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Deena Lorn, designated TK-27342, was a human female stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire.

Deena Lorn is a character who appeared in the short story "The Witness," written by Adam Christopher and published in the collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020. Christopher created Lorn's stormtrooper designation as a reference to the writer Bria LaVorgna, who identifies as TK-27342 in the 501st Legion fan organization.
